alert.note: Alert for Armstrong (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 21 at 6:30PM CDT until July 21 at 6:45PM CDT by NWS Amarillo
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 645 PM CDT FOR CENTRAL ARMSTRONG COUNTY... At 629 PM CDT, automated weather equipment reported a severe thunderstorm was located 12 miles northeast of Wayside, or 12 miles south of Claude, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Automated weather equipment. At 625 PM CDT, a 71 mph gust was recorded 12 miles southwest of Claude. IMPACT...Expect some tree damage. Damage is likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Locations impacted include... Claude. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Amarillo.
